Package com.flipkart.rest

Class AdminRESTAPI

java.lang.Object
com.flipkart.rest.AdminRESTAPI
@Path("/admin")
public class AdminRESTAPI
extends java.lang.Object
Handles Admin related functionality through rest services Validators NotNull-checks for null values, Size checks for length of string and DecimalMin/DecimalMax checks for integer range
Author:
JEDI04
